articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Netflix adds a convenient feature for iOS users to download an entire TV season at once - TechCrunch
articles.description: Netflix announced on Wednesday that it's giving iOS users a new feature that allows them to download an entire season of their favorite TV show with one
articles.content: Netflix announced on Wednesday that it’s giving iOS users a new feature that allows them to download an entire season of their favorite TV show with one tap. The feature first became available to And… [+881 chars]
